field.label: Enable Scheduled Updates
field.help: Enable periodic DNS updates via cron job. Disabled by default - automatic triggers (gateway events, IP changes) are usually sufficient.

field.label: Update Interval (minutes)
field.help: How often to run the update check. Default: 5 minutes. Range: 1-60 minutes.

field.label: IP Change Check Interval (seconds)
field.help: Minimum time between IP checks during scheduled updates. Default: 300 (5 minutes). Range: 60-86400

field.label: Force Update (days)
field.help: Force DNS update even if IP unchanged. 0 = disabled. Default: 0. Range: 0-30
